tooltip.detailed.functionality.fish_trap: Place amethyst crystals, gold blocks, or mob heads within 5 blocks (2 of each for max luck). Higher light level speeds it up, and water depth increases catch amount.
tooltip.functionality.lightning_charger: Smelts and charges items. Place a lightning rod on top.
tooltip.functionality.chevon: Has earthy scent and firm texture.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_chevon: Very chewy and has jump-boosting capabilities
tooltip.functionality.sniffon: It has a herbal, old smell. Might be edible after cooking.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_sniffon: An ancient treat with healthy properties.
tooltip.functionality.gilded_sniffon: Even healthier then it's plain variant.
tooltip.functionality.frog_leg: Looks disgusting and smells like swamp. Better not eat it raw.
tooltip.functionality.cooked_frog_leg: A light, crunchy snack. Removes one negative effect.
tooltip.functionality.terrapin: Stinks of mud and might be poisonous.
tooltip.functionality.terrapin_soup: Smells yummy and is perfect for scuba divers.
tooltip.functionality.fins: They make you swim much faster!
tooltip.functionality.obsidian_fins: They make you able to swim quite fast in lava!
tooltip.detailed.functionality.obsidian_: You might want to be fire resistant for that.
tooltip.functionality.sleeping_herb: Makes you able to sleep during the night no matter what.
tooltip.functionality.phantom_herb: Makes phantoms spawn like you didn't sleep for a while.
tooltip.functionality.chorus_herb: Teleports you to your spawn point.
tooltip.functionality.glowing_herb: Grands immunity to poison, wither and levitation.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.glowing_h: Adding more glow berries in crafting recipe makes the effect last longer.
tooltip.functionality.glow_torch: Works underwater and is unaffected by moving liquids.
tooltip.functionality.pheromones: An universal tame mixture for animals.
tooltip.detailed.functionality.pheromone: Right click on any tamable mob to make it you friend!
tooltip.functionality.phantom_treat: Feed it to any animal to make it much faster.
tooltip.functionality.ancient_seeker: Detects nearby ancient debris for experience levels. Right click to use.
